column4: can someone please help?  I don't think I'm asking for much.. I just want 1680x1050 resolution :\
does your monitor support that big of a resolution? and if so do you have your video card driver?
I have a new laptop, HP NC8430 with a 1680x1050 screen and an ATI X1600 gpu
the ATI driver install failed.  I tried to use the guide on the main ubuntu guide
ok are you using dapper?
Currently I've only got an edgy install disc with me.
http://wiki.cchtml.com/index.php/Ubuntu
Which section should I follow?
depends if you are using dapper or edgy
edgy:
but i mean, within there there are several methods
use method 1
you are using edgy right?
Yes, I'll give it a shot again.
ok then follow method one on the edgy page
by the way, I love the orange on  black look of edgy's startup splash :)
you mean the bootsplash?
yah I guess
No luck.  I'm still suck at the boot splash (almost all the way loaded) with some screen artifacts.  Hard freeze.. can't get to virtual terms.
This is after following Method 1.
Should I try method 2?
if you want
I just want it to work :)
